item.title: P5732 【深基5.习7】杨辉三角
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int a[101][101];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        a[i][1]=1,a[i][i]=1;
    for(int i=3;i<=n;i++)
        for(int j=2;j<=i-1;j++)
            a[i][j]=a[i-1][j-1]+a[i-1][j];
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=1;j<=i;j++)
        {
            cout<<a[i][j]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: P5731 【深基5.习6】蛇形方阵
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int a[10][10];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int direct=0;
    int x=1,y=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=n*n;i++)
    {
        a[x][y]=i;
        int tx=x,ty=y;
        if(direct==0)
            ty+=1;
        if(direct==1)
            tx+=1;
        if(direct==2)
            ty-=1;
        if(direct==3)
            tx-=1;
        if(a[tx][ty]!=0||tx>n||ty>n||tx==0||ty==0)
            direct=(direct+1)%4;
        if(direct==0)
            y+=1;
        if(direct==1)
            x+=1;
        if(direct==2)
            y-=1;
        if(direct==3)
            x-=1;
    }
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            if(a[i][j]<10)
                cout<<"  "<<a[i][j];
            else
                cout<<' '<<a[i][j];
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: P5729 【深基5.例7】工艺品制作
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
bool v[21][21][21];
int main()
{
    int w,x,h;
    cin>>w>>x>>h;
    for(int i=1;i<=w;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=x;j++)
            for(int k=1;k<=h;k++)
                v[i][j][k]=1;
    int q;
    cin>>q;
    for(int l=1;l<=q;l++)
    {
        int x1,y1,z1,x2,y2,z2;
        cin>>x1>>y1>>z1>>x2>>y2>>z2;
        for(int i=x1;i<=x2;i++)
            for(int j=y1;j<=y2;j++)
                for(int k=z1;k<=z2;k++)
                    v[i][j][k]=0;
    }
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=w;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=x;j++)
            for(int k=1;k<=h;k++)
                if(v[i][j][k])
                    ans++;
    cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}

item.title: P5728 【深基5.例5】旗鼓相当的对手
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int a[100001][4];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=3;j++)
            cin>>a[i][j];
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            bool yn=true;
            int tmp=0;
            for(int k=1;k<=3;k++)
            {
                if(abs(a[i][k]-a[j][k])>5)
                    yn=false;
                tmp+=(a[i][k]-a[j][k]);
            }
            if(abs(tmp)>10)
                yn=false;
            if(yn)
                ans++;
        }
    }
    cout<<ans; 
    return 0;
}

item.title: P5727 【深基5.例3】冰雹猜想
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int a[100001];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int ans=1;
    while(n!=1)
    {
        a[ans]=n;
        if(n%2==0)
            n/=2;
        else
            n=n*3+1;
        ans++;
    }
    a[ans]=1;
    for(int i=ans;i>=1;i--)
    {
        cout<<a[i]<<" ";
    }
    return 0;
}

item.title: P2911 [USACO08OCT] Bovine Bones G
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int b[85],c[88888];
int main()
{
    int a[4];
    int i,j,k,max=-1;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&a[1],&a[2],&a[3]);
    for(i=1;i<=a[1];i++)
        for(j=1;j<=a[2];j++)
            for(k=1;k<=a[3];k++)
            {
                b[i+j+k]++;
            }
    for(i=3;i<=85;i++)
        if(b[i]>max)
            {
                max=b[i];
                c[max]++;
                if(c[max]==1)
                    k=i;
            }
    printf("%d",k);
    return 0;
}

item.title: P2615 [NOIP2015 提高组] 神奇的幻方
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
struct point
{
	int x,y;
}a[1600];
int x[40][40];
int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	a[1].x=1,a[1].y=n/2+1;
	x[1][n/2+1]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<=n*n;i++)
	{
		if(a[i-1].x==1&&a[i-1].y==n)
			a[i].x=2,a[i].y=n;
		else if(a[i-1].x==1&&a[i-1].y!=n)
			a[i].x=n,a[i].y=a[i-1].y+1;
		else if(a[i-1].x!=1&&a[i-1].y==n)
			a[i].x=a[i-1].x-1,a[i].y=1;
		else if(x[a[i-1].x-1][a[i-1].y+1]!=0)
			a[i].x=a[i-1].x+1,a[i].y=a[i-1].y;
		else
			a[i].x=a[i-1].x-1,a[i].y=a[i-1].y+1;
		x[a[i].x][a[i].y]=i;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
			printf("%d ",x[i][j]);
		printf("\n");
	} 
	return 0;
}

item.title: P2550 [AHOI2001] 彩票摇奖
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int ans[8],a[1001][8],anss[8];
int main()
{
	int n;
	cin>>n; 
	for(int i=1;i<=7;i++)
		cin>>ans[i];
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		for(int j=1;j<=7;j++)
			cin>>a[i][j];
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		int s=0;
		for(int j=1;j<=7;j++)
		{
			for(int k=1;k<=7;k++)
			{
				if(a[i][j]==ans[k])
					s++;
			}
			
		}
		anss[8-s]++;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=7;i++)
		cout<<anss[i]<<" ";
	 
    return 0;
}

item.title: P2141 [NOIP2014 普及组] 珠心算测验
item.dc:creator: ZJM
item.description:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[1000000];
int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
    	cin>>a[i];
		}
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(int j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
			{
				for(int k=1;k<=n;k++)
				{
					if(a[i]+a[j]==a[k])
					{
						ans++;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
